plot: Five years after contact with aliens, the earth finds itself in ruins and guns rule the land. Led by the strongest who remain, small factions roam and scavenge, trying to survive in the face of ever present violence and sickness.
plot_en: Five years after contact with aliens, the earth finds itself in ruins and guns rule the land. Led by the strongest who remain, small factions roam and scavenge, trying to survive in the face of ever present violence and sickness.
plot_es: Five years after contact with aliens, the earth finds itself in ruins and guns rule the land. Led by the strongest who remain, small factions roam and scavenge, trying to survive in the face of ever present violence and sickness.
title: Omega
